website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Charged Push received ambivalent feedback from the users. Some found the shoe comfortable and supportive for a variety of training activities, while others disfavored it for being too stiff and rigid. The size and fit were right for some wearers, yet it ran too small and narrow for the majority. Many reviewers also took a dim view of the burrito tongue construction. Overall, the trainer wasn’t able to meet the needs of most training enthusiasts, but it still worked well for some of the buyers.
pros: A handful of reviewers found the Under Armour Charged Push comfortable and supportive enough for gym workouts, cross-training, and HIIT sessions
Several buyers mentioned that the trainer ran true to size
A few people appreciated the available color schemes
Some testers complimented the shoe on its lightweight nature
A user commented that the trainer provided sufficient support and stability for heavy lifts
cons: The footwear ran small and narrow for most users
A few testers found it difficult to put on the shoe because of the tongue construction
The tongue was too rigid and dug into the ankle, as stated by a handful of wearers
Some reviewers complained about the sole being too stiff and not cushioned enough
A disappointed purchaser wrote that this footwear seemed cheaply made

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe with lots of lateral support
customer_reviews.text: I do HIIT workouts (insanity type workouts) and I needed a shoe that would give me lateral support! These shoes are amazing and perfect for this type of training. I think I have wide feet and I did not have any trouble getting my foot into the shoe. Based on the reviews I almost didn't order these! Under armour support recommended them to me based on what I needed out of my shoe! I have tried on 5 other UA training shoes and these were my favorite! I won't run or lift in these shoes so I can't say if they will be great for that. In my opinion they ran true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Really like these shoes for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes for the gym. I use them for cross training, circuits, lifting, and a little running (2-3 miles). They are comfortable and provide stability. True to size, a little stiff at first, but broken in even after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shoe provides great support to push you through the toughest of workouts
customer_reviews.text: This shoe provides great support to push you through the toughest of workouts. It does come up a bit high in the front so if you don't like that full coverage then it might not be right for you otherwise I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Much narrower then other Under Armour shoes I have purchased. Great Color, light weight. Couldn't get my foot into the shoe at all, and it was my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for high impact
customer_reviews.text: Initially this were a bit tight and uncomfortable. The tongue kind of dug into the top of my foot but after wearing them around a bit they stretched out and were very comfortable. I wore them to hiit class and they were great. This is my third pair of Under Armour cross trainers. They've all been great but these my favorite so far. These fit true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Picklebelly

customer_reviews.title: Finally a women's size 12 that fits like a 12!!
customer_reviews.text: Finding women's size 12 training shoes is so hard. There are no half sizes to play with and many companies just don't make them. I was very excited to receive these and have them actually fit well (which I haven't been able to say about several other UA shoes!)! The purple color is just a bonus. I will say the lacing is a bit weird and it takes a bit to figure out how to tie them without putting pressure on the top of your foot but once I worked that out they have been wonderful shoes!
customer_reviews.author: DLems

customer_reviews.title: Amazon to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only worn them once and they didnt hurt my feet. Fit snug but I wouldn't get a bigger size. Just need to be broken in. Love the colors. And it was NOT available on the under armour app I have in my size, but it was through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable pair of sneakers I’ve ever bought. The color is very nice. I usually wear sneakers only to exercise but I really like the way they look with denim. These will be my go to sneakers only to use with casual wear. Going to try to keep them nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Does the person who designed these even have feet? Horrible horrible horrible horrible horrible
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the shoe is sewn down on the outer side with a piece of elastic and makes this shoe IMPOSSIBLE to put on. The tongue is wrinkled, stretched out, and the elastic sewn to it is cutting into my foot. I spend 30 minutes trying to put on theses shoes thinking I was stupid. The shoes are stupid. ZERO STARS AWFULL
customer_reviews.author: Ramona L.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but tongue cuts into ankle
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe except the tongue connects to the shoe on one side, so it doesn’t give like a regular detached tongue. It digs into the ankle when walking or running and is very uncomfortable. Hoping It breaks in
customer_reviews.author: DenKag

customer_reviews.title: Nope, just no
customer_reviews.text: The "tongue" portion of the shoe is actually connected to one side making it very uncomfortable on the fronts of your ankles. I ordered a size up from what my normal shoe size is and they were still too small. I usually really like under armour's stuff, but these just completely missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Patton

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these. The colors are great and they have ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. The colors are great and they have so many reviews as being great for interval training. I need a show that is supportive and can handle high intensity interval training - jumps, lunges, side shuffles, burpees, etc. These shoes would be great for leg day. But not for leg day with plyometric movements.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyhey girl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I do krav maga so need a lot of stability and these shoes are great! I wear size 7, ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly. I have narrow flat feet though, I wouldn't recommend these if you have wide feet with high arches, they'd be hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, wish the didn't fit like Wide?
customer_reviews.text: SHOES LOOK LIKE PICTURES...But seem on Wider side, Not medium fit? If you wear or need wider fit these are Perfect for You! UNFORTUNATELY the Box Says size 8, but no Width?
customer_reviews.author: Elise M

customer_reviews.title: Works great for weight lifting/HIIT etc..
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all my workouts. Use these for lifting, HIIT, marshal arts based work out etc... Comfortable and did NOT have to replace the insole to keep my heel pain from flaring up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected. I use them for HIIT workouts. I've been wearing them for over a month. They are a little odd at first, but I'm used to the side tongue now. I would rate them a C+/B-.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I was really not a fan of these sneakers, they hurt my feet a TON. It might be because I have flat feet, but I couldn't even walk around in them, let alone workout. They seemed to be cheaply made as well. I would suggest investing in a better pair of sneakers than buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: weird design
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, but was taken back by the awkward design when I received them. However, getting past the weird design.. they do live up to their comfort. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dirtbikemama

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it bc of the color
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it bc of the color. I usually buy shoes that run small but this runs super small. I wear a size 5. Shoe is really stiff and doesn't seem to offer much support for impact.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... the shoe strings come untied a lot- they look great though: )
customer_reviews.text: they are the hardest shoe to get on I have ever seen- bc of way tongue made- it is ridiculous to get into- but once foot in its comfy shoe- and the shoe strings come untied a lot- they look great though :)
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Comfortable and stylish! I use them every day for working out and they've been great. The only downside is that the elastic on the inside to hold the tongue gets kind of bunched up when you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Val & Randi

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift for my sissy. Loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: Creolegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality shoe from Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality shoe from Under Armour. I teach Insanity Live! classes 2x a week at a local gym. Mind you this is all I used them for. I’ve been using them for almost 2 months and recently I’ve noticed the outer stitching is tearing on both shoes. Very disappointed. I gave it 3 starts because the shoe is good for cross training but quality not the best being that is UA shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer font

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & stylish
customer_reviews.text: Needed some cross-trainers for my CrossFit classes (lifting & workouts), never bought UA before, but these fit good, look good and are working out great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker, I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is very comfortable! I have wide feet and this accommodates them well.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice. Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Style is nice. Fit perfectly. Not as cushiony as I would have it. Not for long periods on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: gayle carias

customer_reviews.title: I love UA shoes, but not this style.
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable... and they crease and bend weird. I would not buy this style ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F Lebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Push Cross Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe and it fits well. I just had to get used to the tongue of the shoe and how it only lifts on one side which makes it a little more difficult to fit my feet into them.
customer_reviews.author: Gail B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for high intensity workouts. Took a few days to break them in, but now they feel fantastic. This is my first pair of Under Armour training shoes, and I’ll definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: DARLA CORDOVA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shoe but was a little to small.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable. They are very stiff in the heal area. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very tight..... too expensive to break in....! It should fit comfortable from the start...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe ran very small. Order a whole size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Velicia R.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are a bit tight buy comfortable. I've only had them 2 months and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a bit tight buy comfortable. I've only had them 2 months and the side is splitting along the seam on the right shoe by the toes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously fantastic shoe for hiit and accessory work. Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Houser

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! A fitted shoe but not uncomfortable at all! Very lightweight as well!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers. Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. Love them! Very comfortable. Great support! True to size! I always wear 8, this is for 25 sm.
customer_reviews.author: Regina288@mail.ru

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a disappointment. The plastic in the back heel is already bent down and therefore rubbing. I should have just ordered another pair of my non-UA ones since these were a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I pretty much just had to break them in
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little small but still fits. I pretty much just had to break them in. Absolutely love though!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 7. 5 and received an 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7.5 and received an 8, so the shoe is too big. I will be returning for the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. I get lots of compliments when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller doesn't live up to refund policy
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return this item, but when I attempted to print the return label, it wouldn't appear. I tried contacting the seller and received no reply. I hope if you order this item, you're happy with it because you're stuck with it. I'm certainly stuck with my $95 and can't wear the shoes. Very unhappy. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Bieberhousen

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were a tiny bit smaller on the Heel then ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were a tiny bit smaller on the Heel then expected and a little lower quality then I thought, sole is not memory foam or very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonner

customer_reviews.title: never had shoes like this before
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don't have a center tongue, it might have been described that way but I didn't notice. The tongue is kind of on the side, never had shoes like this before.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl ansel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wider than expected. Had to return as they looked weird on me, v otherwise the color was cute
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: The tongue fits odd on this shoe it won’t flatten ...
customer_reviews.text: The tongue fits odd on this shoe it won’t flatten out and can’t be straightened out with this design.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Charged Push Training Shoes Cross-Trainer
product_meta.description: Sock-like burrito tongue construction for a precise, sleek fit & a comfortably snug feel. Breathable micromesh upper with internal saddle construction for midfoot support & a customized fit. Dynamic webbing loops hug the foot to enhance fit & support during multi-directional movement. Lateral rubber forefoot wrap provides traction & stability . Die-cut, full-length sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit. Charged Cushioningdelivers the ultimate in responsive cushioning. Cored out sections of midsole for less bulk & improved flexibility . Molded rubber sidewalls increase durability & support lateral movement. Multi-directional traction pattern on outsole provides versatility & grip on all surfaces. Offset: 5 mm. Weight: 7.50 oz.
feature_bullets: Take your workout sesh to new limits in the Under Armour® UA Charged Push TR Segmented Color cross-training shoe!
Breathable micromesh uppers with internal support saddle for added structure and a better fit.
Dynamic webbing loops hug the foot for added support during multidirectional movements.

Synthetic toe and heel overlays. Lightly padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Die-cut textile sockliner. Lateral rubber forefoot wrap adds traction and stability. Molded rubber sidewalls supply enhanced durability and support lateral movements. Charged Cushioning® provides optimally responsive cushioning. Cored out sections of the midsole offer less bulk and increased flexibility. Strategically-placed rubber outsole pods in high-wear areas f
